name: Just a Day
description:
'Just a Day' explores the visual and mechanical presentation of narrative choice. 

This is your day. What will you eat for breakfast? What will you take to school? And most importantly, whose side will you take?

Originally created as a mobile game, the UI was modified slightly to better suit a browser version.

It will take approximately 10 minutes to play the whole story.

Credits to Inkle's scripting language 'Ink' which was used for the writing.

Enjoy!
